attributes.action: Stop banning dogs and introduce a dangerous dog owners ACT
attributes.additional_details: Because banning a breed simply is not working ,its NEVER the fault of the breed in 99.9% of cases its the owners fault due to not understanding there dogs needs
attributes.background: Introduce licensing for dogs owners to prevent irresponsible dog owners creating dangerous dogs

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624876

If you'd like something different, you could start a new petition making clear what that is.
